{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/title|ends_with}}
{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ends_with( basic_string_view sv ) const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ends_with( CharT ch ) const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|1=
constexpr bool ends_with( const CharT* s ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Checks if the string view ends with the given suffix, where
@1@ the suffix is a string view. Effectively returns {{c|1=size() &gt;= sv.size() &amp;&amp; compare(size() - sv.size(), npos, sv) == 0}}.
@2@ the suffix is a single character. Effectively returns {{c|1=!empty() &amp;&amp; Traits::eq(back(), ch)}}.
@3@ the suffix is a null-terminated character string. Effectively returns {{c|1=ends_with(basic_string_view(s))}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|sv|a string view which may be a result of implicit conversion from {{tt|std::basic_string}}}}
{{par|ch|a single character}}
{{par|s|a null-terminated character string}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the string view ends with the provided suffix, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Notes===
{{feature test macro|__cpp_lib_starts_ends_with|String prefix and suffix checking: {{lc|starts_with()}} and {{lc|ends_with()}}|std=C++20|value=201711L}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cassert&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;

int main()
{
    using namespace std::literals;

    assert
    (""
        // (1) ends_with( basic_string_view sv )
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("https://cppreference.com").ends_with(".com"sv) == true
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("https://cppreference.com").ends_with(".org"sv) == false

        // (2) ends_with( CharT c )
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("C++20").ends_with('0') == true
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("C++20").ends_with('3') == false

        // (3) ends_with( const CharT* s )
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("string_view").ends_with("view") == true
        &amp;&amp; std::string_view("string_view").ends_with("View") == false
    );
}
}}
